original_text:
Black River Gold
La slot Black River Gold è stata sviluppata dalla software house ELK Studios e si gioca con 6 rulli e 4.096 modi per vincere. Ambientata all’inizio del XX secolo nel selvaggio West, questa slot gratis ha come protagonista il personaggio Kane, alla ricerca di fortuna. Aiutalo ad aumentare la sua ricchezza grazie alle originali funzionalità extra!
Caratteristiche principali della slot gratis Black River Gold
Disponibile su tutti i dispositivi a soli 20 centesimi a giro fino ad un massimo di 100,00€, questa slot ispirata al selvaggio West è il 4 ° gioco della serie ELK Gold. Con la funzione speciale Avalanche, le righe possono espandersi fino a 8 per darti ben 262.144 modi per vincere! C’è anche un Compass Wild che rende selvaggi alcuni simboli, maxi simboli fino a 4×4, un simbolo Revolver che può regalare giri gratis e jolly appiccicosi. L’RTP è del 96,1% e la vincita massima è di 5.000 x puntata per giro.
Funzione Avalanche
Quando ottieni una combinazione vincente, tutti i simboli che contribuiscono esplodono e lasciano spazio a nuovi simboli che entrano in gioco. Conosciuta come la funzione valanga, una riga supplementare di simboli viene aggiunta in alto. Le valanghe continue possono portare a 8 file in totale. Con ogni nuova riga, aumenta il numero di modi per vincere:

4 file = 4.096 modi per vincere
5 file = 15.625 modi per vincere
6 file = 46.656 modi per vincere
7 file = 117.649 modi per vincere
8 righe = 262.144 modi per vincere

(La funzione Avalanche è disponibile in altre slot della serie Gold di ELK Studios come ad esempio la slot online Cygnus).
Funzionalità Revolver
I simboli grandi, che possono avere dimensioni fino a 4×4, possono assorbire simboli più piccoli al di sotto di essi. Quando ciò accade, si attiva la funzione . Quando è pieno, il Revolver diventa completamente selvaggio per aumentare il potenziale di vincita.
Funzione Wild Compass
Cerca il simbolo Wild Compass. Quando i simboli coincidono attraverso la Wild Compass, diventano anche simboli jolly. Quando si raggiunge la riga inferiore, si attiva il simbolo jolly.
Come si comporta il Bonus Game in Black River Gold?
Ci sono 3 funzioni bonus in Black River Gold. Tutte e 5 le bobine possono contenere pile di simboli potenziati e un simbolo Respin che può atterrare con simboli appiccicosi. Con il bonus game potrai beneficiare di infiniti giri gratuiti e trasformare i simboli in opportunità di vincita maggiore! l numero di giri gratuiti che riceverai dipende dal numero di simboli bonus di attivazione:

3 simboli bonus = 10 giri gratuiti
4 simboli bonus = 15 giri gratuiti
5 simboli bonus = 20 giri gratuiti
6 simboli bonus = 25 giri gratuiti

Che cos’è il livello di sicurezza?
A partire da 4 file e 4.096 modi per vincere, ogni vittoria aggiunge un’altra riga e più modi per vincere, fino a 8 righe e 262.144 opzioni di vittoria. A differenza del gioco base, il numero di file e le modalità di vittoria non possono che aumentare. Questa funzione è nota come livello di sicurezza.
Simboli principali di Black River Gold
Con montagne rocciose sullo sfondo, i rulli sono inseriti in una struttura metallica. C’è una classica colonna sonora occidentale mentre giri le ruote. I simboli includono:

Le carte da gioco A, K, Q e J
Ci sono anche spille, distintivi di sceriffo, bicchieri di whisky e revolver
Incontrerai anche pietre preziose, pepite d’oro e diamanti.
Kane, il personaggio principale, è il simbolo del valore più alto che restituisce 1,8, 2, 2,5 o 3 volte la puntata per 3, 4, 5 o 6 in combinazione
La rosa rossa è il simbolo jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne i simboli scatter e wild compass.

Tutti i simboli possono apparire come simboli MAXI, il che significa che potrai trovarti sulla schermata di gioco simboli Super, Mega ed Epici rispettivamente di dimensioni 2×2, 3×3 e 4×4.
Conclusioni finali sulla slot mobile Black River Gold
Come avrai modo di constatare, esiste sia una versione desktop che tablet. Questo perché ELK Studios produce tutti i suoi giochi con tecnologia HTML5, concentrandosi maggiormente sui giochi mobili. A livello di gameplay, l’ho trovato simile ad altre serie della serie Gold, ma con extra aggiunti alla funzione Revolver, alla funzione Wild Compass e ai caratteristici jolly appiccicosi che rendono Black River Gold un gioco originale. Si tratta un’altro buon prodotto realizzato da ELK Studios, anche se titoli come Dead o Alive II di NetEnt e Deadwood di Nolimit City regalano maggiori opportunità in termini di gameplay e massimo potenziale di vincita!

FAQS frequenti su Black River Gold 
Qual è la vincita massima della slot Black River Gold?

La vincita massima di un giro o di un giro gratuito nello slot Black River Gold è 5.000 volte la puntata totale. Per raggiungere questo obiettivo, devi giocare con le righe e i modi aggiunti per vincere. La funzione Avalanche può darti 8 file con 262.144 modi per vincere. Nella funzione Bonus Game, il numero di file/modi per vincere può solo aumentare, il che aggiunge ulteriori probabilità di vincere 5.000 volte la puntata.



A quanto ammonta l’RTP della slot gratis Black River Gold?

Il Black River Gold RTP è pari al 96,1%. Con l'RTP medio di una slot di ELK Studios, otterrai in media un ritorno di 96,10€ per ogni 100€ spesi. La frequenza dei colpi è del 24,1%, il che significa che quasi 1 su 4 giri si tradurrà in una combinazione vincente. Con ogni vincita, aumenta il numero di file e le modalità per vincere, fino a 8 righe e 262.144 modi di potenziale vittoria.



Esiste una slot Black River Gold in versione mobile?

Certamente! ELK Studios è un fornitore di slot mobile-first, il che significa che creano le loro slot online pensando al gioco su dispositivi mobili. Black River Gold può anche essere giocato su dispositivi desktop e tablet. Provalo gratuitamente qui in uno dei nostri casinò con licenza ADM!

Black River Gold is a slot game developed by ELK Studios that features 6 reels and 4,096 ways to win. Set in the Wild West of the early 20th Century, the game follows the protagonist Kane on his quest for fortune. Help him increase his wealth with original extra features!

Main features of Black River Gold:

Available on all devices, from just 20 cents to a maximum of 100 euros per spin, this Wild West inspired slot is the 4th game in the ELK Gold series. With the special Avalanche feature, the rows can expand up to 8 to give you a whopping 262,144 ways to win! There is also a Compass Wild that makes certain symbols wild, maxi symbols up to 4x4, a Revolver symbol that can offer free spins, and sticky wilds. The RTP is 96.1% and the maximum win is 5,000x the bet per spin.

Avalanche feature:

When you get a winning combination, all symbols that contribute explode and make room for new symbols that come into play. Known as the Avalanche feature, an additional row of symbols is added above. Continuous avalanches can lead to 8 rows in total. With each new row, the number of ways to win increases:

4 rows = 4,096 ways to win
5 rows = 15,625 ways to win
6 rows = 46,656 ways to win
7 rows = 117,649 ways to win
8 rows = 262,144 ways to win

(The Avalanche feature is available in other slots from the ELK Studios Gold series, such as the online slot Cygnus).

Revolver feature:

Larger symbols, which can be as big as 4x4, can absorb smaller ones below them. When this happens, the Revolver feature is activated. Once it's full, the Revolver becomes entirely wild to increase the potential for winning.

Wild Compass feature:

Look for the Wild Compass symbol. When symbols match across the Wild Compass, they also become wild symbols. When you reach the bottom row, the wild symbol is activated.

How does the Bonus Game work in Black River Gold?

There are 3 bonus features in Black River Gold. All 5 reels can contain stacks of enhanced symbols and a Respin symbol that can land with sticky symbols. With the bonus game, you can benefit from infinite free spins and turn symbols into greater winning opportunities! The number of free spins you receive depends on the number of activation bonus symbols:

3 bonus symbols = 10 free spins
4 bonus symbols = 15 free spins
5 bonus symbols = 20 free spins
6 bonus symbols = 25 free spins

What is the Security Level?

Starting from 4 rows and 4,096 ways to win, each win adds another row and more ways to win, up to 8 rows and 262,144 potential winning options. Unlike the base game, the number of rows and winning modes can only increase. This feature is known as the Security Level.

Main symbols of Black River Gold:

With rocky mountains in the background, the reels are set in a metal frame. There is a classic Western soundtrack as you spin the reels. Symbols include:

A, K, Q, and J playing cards
There are also sheriff badges, whisky glasses, and revolvers
You'll also encounter precious stones, gold nuggets, and diamonds.
Kane, the main character, is the highest-paying symbol, returning 1.8, 2, 2.5, or 3 times the bet for 3, 4, 5, or 6 in combination
The red rose is the wild symbol and replaces all symbols except scatter and Wild Compass symbols.

All symbols can appear as MAXI symbols, meaning you can find Super, Mega, and Epic symbols respectively on the game screen with sizes of 2x2, 3x3, and 4x4.

Final thoughts on Black River Gold:

As you can see, there is both a desktop and tablet version. This is because ELK Studios produces all of its games using HTML5 technology, focusing primarily on mobile games. In terms of gameplay, I found it similar to other series in the Gold series, but with added extras to the Revolver feature, the Wild Compass feature, and the distinctive sticky wilds that make Black River Gold an original game. It is another good product made by ELK Studios, but titles like Dead or Alive II from NetEnt and Deadwood from Nolimit City offer greater opportunities in terms of gameplay and maximum win potential!

FAQs about Black River Gold:

What is the maximum payout of the Black River Gold slot?

The maximum win of a spin or a free spin in the Black River Gold slot is 5,000 times the total bet. To achieve this goal, you must play with the added rows and ways to win. The Avalanche feature can give you 8 rows with 262,144 ways to win. In the Bonus Game feature, the number of rows/ways to win can only increase, which adds further chances to win 5,000 times the bet.

What is the Black River Gold free slot RTP?

The Black River Gold RTP is 96.1%. With the average RTP of an ELK Studios slot, you will get an average return of 96.10 euros for every 100 euros spent. The hit rate is 24.1%, meaning that almost 1 out of 4 spins will result in a winning combination. With each win, the number of rows and ways to win increases to 8 rows and 262,144 potential winning modes.

Is there a Black River Gold slot for mobile devices?

Certainly! ELK Studios is a mobile-first slot provider, which means they create their online slots with mobile gaming in mind. Black River Gold can also be played on desktop and tablet devices. Try it for free here in one of our ADM licensed casinos!

message.content:
Black River Gold: An Expert Review on ELK Studios' Latest Slot Game

Black River Gold is the latest slot game developed by the renowned software house ELK Studios. Set in the wild west at the beginning of the 20th century, this free slot game features the character Kane, on the hunt for riches. Join him and explore the original extra features to increase his wealth.

Main Features of Black River Gold

With 6 reels and 4096 ways to win, this wild west-inspired slot game is the fourth game in the ELK Gold series. It's available on all devices from just 20 cents up to a maximum of 100.00€. With the special Avalanche feature, the rows can expand up to 8 to give you a whopping 262,144 ways to win! Plus, there's a Compass Wild that turns some symbols wild, maxi symbols up to 4x4, a Revolver symbol that can award free spins and sticky wilds. The RTP is 96.1%, and the maximum win is 5,000x the bet per spin.

The Avalanche Feature

When you land a winning combination, all the contributing symbols explode and make way for new symbols. Known as the Avalanche feature, an additional row of symbols is added at the top. Continuous avalanches can lead to 8 rows in total. With each new row, the number of ways to win increases:

4 rows = 4,096 ways to win
5 rows = 15,625 ways to win
6 rows = 46,656 ways to win
7 rows = 117,649 ways to win
8 rows = 262,144 ways to win

(The Avalanche feature is also available in other slots of the ELK Gold series, such as the online slot Cygnus).

Revolver Feature

The large symbols, which can be up to 4x4, can absorb smaller symbols under them. When this happens, the Revolver feature is activated. When it's full, the Revolver becomes fully wild to increase the win potential.

Wild Compass Feature

Look out for the Wild Compass symbol. When the symbols match through the Wild Compass, they also become wild symbols. When you reach the bottom row, the wild symbol is triggered.

How Does the Bonus Game Work in Black River Gold?

There are 3 bonus features in Black River Gold. All 5 reels can contain stacks of enhanced symbols and a Respin symbol that can land with sticky symbols. With the bonus game, you can enjoy endless free spins and transform symbols into bigger win opportunities! The number of free spins you'll receive depends on the number of activation bonus symbols:

3 bonus symbols = 10 free spins
4 bonus symbols = 15 free spins
5 bonus symbols = 20 free spins
6 bonus symbols = 25 free spins

What Is the Safety Level?

Starting from 4 rows and 4,096 ways to win, every win adds another row and more ways to win, up to 8 rows and 262,144 ways of potential win. Unlike the base game, the number of rows and ways to win can only increase. This feature is known as the safety level.

Main Symbols of Black River Gold

With rocky mountains in the background, the reels are set in a metal structure. There's a classic western soundtrack while you spin the reels. The symbols include:

The A, K, Q, and J playing cards
There are also sheriff badges, whiskey glasses, and revolvers
You'll also encounter precious stones, gold nuggets, and diamonds.
Kane, the main character, is the highest-paying symbol that returns 1.8, 2, 2.5, or 3 times the bet for 3, 4, 5, or 6 in combination
The red rose is the wild symbol and substitutes for all symbols except the scatter and Wild Compass symbols.

All symbols can appear as MAXI symbols, which means that you can see Super, Mega, and Epic symbols respectively sized 2x2, 3x3, and 4x4 on the screen.

Final Thoughts on Black River Gold Mobile Slot

As you can see, there's both a desktop and tablet version available. This is because ELK Studios produces all its games with HTML5 technology, primarily focusing on mobile gameplay. In terms of gameplay, I found it similar to other series in the Gold series, but with extras added to the Revolver feature, the Wild Compass feature, and the characteristic sticky wilds that make Black River Gold a unique game. It's another great product from ELK Studios, although titles like NetEnt's Dead or Alive II and Nolimit City's Deadwood provide greater opportunities in terms of gameplay and maximum win potential!

Frequently Asked Questions about Black River Gold

What is the maximum win of the Black River Gold slot?

The maximum win for one spin or free spin in the Black River Gold slot game is 5,000 times the total bet. To achieve this goal, you must play with the added rows and ways to win. The Avalanche feature can give you 8 rows with 262,144 ways to win. In the Bonus Game feature, the number of rows/ways to win can only increase, adding further chances to win 5,000 times the bet.

What is the RTP of the free slot game Black River Gold?

The Black River Gold RTP is 96.1%. With the average RTP of an ELK Studios slot, you'll get an average return of 96.10€ for every 100€ spent. The hit frequency is 24.1%, meaning that nearly 1 in 4 spins will result in a winning combination. With every win, the number of rows and ways to win increases, up to 8 rows and 262,144 potential win options.

Is there a mobile version of the Black River Gold slot?

Certainly! ELK Studios is a mobile-first slot provider, meaning that they create their online slots with mobile gaming in mind. Black River Gold can also be played on desktop and tablet devices. Try it out for free in one of our ADM-licensed casinos!

Review: Black River Gold: An Expert Review on ELK Studios' Latest Slot Game

Black River Gold is the latest slot game developed by the renowned software house ELK Studios. Set in the wild west at the beginning of the 20th century, this free slot game features the character Kane, on the hunt for riches. Join him and explore the original extra features to increase his wealth.

Main Features of Black River Gold

With 6 reels and 4096 ways to win, this wild west-inspired slot game is the fourth game in the ELK Gold series. It's available on all devices from just 20 cents up to a maximum of 100.00€. With the special Avalanche feature, the rows can expand up to 8 to give you a whopping 262,144 ways to win! Plus, there's a Compass Wild that turns some symbols wild, maxi symbols up to 4x4, a Revolver symbol that can award free spins and sticky wilds. The RTP is 96.1%, and the maximum win is 5,000x the bet per spin.

The Avalanche Feature

When you land a winning combination, all the contributing symbols explode and make way for new symbols. Known as the Avalanche feature, an additional row of symbols is added at the top. Continuous avalanches can lead to 8 rows in total. With each new row, the number of ways to win increases:

4 rows = 4,096 ways to win
5 rows = 15,625 ways to win
6 rows = 46,656 ways to win
7 rows = 117,649 ways to win
8 rows = 262,144 ways to win

(The Avalanche feature is also available in other slots of the ELK Gold series, such as the online slot Cygnus).

Revolver Feature

The large symbols, which can be up to 4x4, can absorb smaller symbols under them. When this happens, the Revolver feature is activated. When it's full, the Revolver becomes fully wild to increase the win potential.

Wild Compass Feature

Look out for the Wild Compass symbol. When the symbols match through the Wild Compass, they also become wild symbols. When you reach the bottom row, the wild symbol is triggered.

How Does the Bonus Game Work in Black River Gold?

There are 3 bonus features in Black River Gold. All 5 reels can contain stacks of enhanced symbols and a Respin symbol that can land with sticky symbols. With the bonus game, you can enjoy endless free spins and transform symbols into bigger win opportunities! The number of free spins you'll receive depends on the number of activation bonus symbols:

3 bonus symbols = 10 free spins
4 bonus symbols = 15 free spins
5 bonus symbols = 20 free spins
6 bonus symbols = 25 free spins

What Is the Safety Level?

Starting from 4 rows and 4,096 ways to win, every win adds another row and more ways to win, up to 8 rows and 262,144 ways of potential win. Unlike the base game, the number of rows and ways to win can only increase. This feature is known as the safety level.

Main Symbols of Black River Gold

With rocky mountains in the background, the reels are set in a metal structure. There's a classic western soundtrack while you spin the reels. The symbols include:

The A, K, Q, and J playing cards
There are also sheriff badges, whiskey glasses, and revolvers
You'll also encounter precious stones, gold nuggets, and diamonds.
Kane, the main character, is the highest-paying symbol that returns 1.8, 2, 2.5, or 3 times the bet for 3, 4, 5, or 6 in combination
The red rose is the wild symbol and substitutes for all symbols except the scatter and Wild Compass symbols.

All symbols can appear as MAXI symbols, which means that you can see Super, Mega, and Epic symbols respectively sized 2x2, 3x3, and 4x4 on the screen.

Final Thoughts on Black River Gold Mobile Slot

As you can see, there's both a desktop and tablet version available. This is because ELK Studios produces all its games with HTML5 technology, primarily focusing on mobile gameplay. In terms of gameplay, I found it similar to other series in the Gold series, but with extras added to the Revolver feature, the Wild Compass feature, and the characteristic sticky wilds that make Black River Gold a unique game. It's another great product from ELK Studios, although titles like NetEnt's Dead or Alive II and Nolimit City's Deadwood provide greater opportunities in terms of gameplay and maximum win potential!

The maximum win for one spin or free spin in the Black River Gold slot game is 5,000 times the total bet. To achieve this goal, you must play with the added rows and ways to win. The Avalanche feature can give you 8 rows with 262,144 ways to win. In the Bonus Game feature, the number of rows/ways to win can only increase, adding further chances to win 5,000 times the bet.

With every win, the number of rows and ways to win increases, up to 8 rows and 262,144 potential win options.

Is there a mobile version of the Black River Gold slot?

When you land a winning combination, all the contributing symbols explode and make way for new symbols. Known as the Avalanche feature, an additional row of symbols is added at the top. Continuous avalanches can lead to 8 rows in total. With each new row, the number of ways to win increases:

4 rows = 4,096 ways to win
5 rows = 15,625 ways to win

Wild Compass Feature

Look out for the Wild Compass symbol. When the symbols match through the Wild Compass, they also become wild symbols. When you reach the bottom row, the wild symbol is triggered.

Main Symbols of Black River Gold

All symbols can appear as MAXI symbols, which means that you can see Super, Mega, and Epic symbols respectively sized 2x2, 3x3, and 4x4 on the screen.

Review: Black River Gold: An Expert Review on ELK Studios' Latest Slot Game

Black River Gold is the latest slot game developed by the renowned software house ELK Studios. Set in the wild west at the beginning of the 20th century, this free slot game features the character Kane, on the hunt for riches. Join him and explore the original extra features to increase his wealth.

Main Features of Black River Gold

With 6 reels and 4096 ways to win, this wild west-inspired slot game is the fourth game in the ELK Gold series. It's available on all devices from just 20 cents up to a maximum of 100.00€. With the special Avalanche feature, the rows can expand up to 8 to give you a whopping 262,144 ways to win! Plus, there's a Compass Wild that turns some symbols wild, maxi symbols up to 4x4, a Revolver symbol that can award free spins and sticky wilds. The RTP is 96.1%, and the maximum win is 5,000x the bet per spin.

The Avalanche Feature

When you land a winning combination, all the contributing symbols explode and make way for new symbols. Known as the Avalanche feature, an additional row of symbols is added at the top. Continuous avalanches can lead to 8 rows in total. With each new row, the number of ways to win increases:

4 rows = 4,096 ways to win
5 rows = 15,625 ways to win
6 rows = 46,656 ways to win
7 rows = 117,649 ways to win
8 rows = 262,144 ways to win

(The Avalanche feature is also available in other slots of the ELK Gold series, such as the online slot Cygnus).

Revolver Feature

The large symbols, which can be up to 4x4, can absorb smaller symbols under them. When this happens, the Revolver feature is activated. When it's full, the Revolver becomes fully wild to increase the win potential.

Wild Compass Feature

Look out for the Wild Compass symbol. When the symbols match through the Wild Compass, they also become wild symbols. When you reach the bottom row, the wild symbol is triggered.

How Does the Bonus Game Work in Black River Gold?

There are 3 bonus features in Black River Gold. All 5 reels can contain stacks of enhanced symbols and a Respin symbol that can land with sticky symbols. With the bonus game, you can enjoy endless free spins and transform symbols into bigger win opportunities! The number of free spins you'll receive depends on the number of activation bonus symbols:

3 bonus symbols = 10 free spins
4 bonus symbols = 15 free spins
5 bonus symbols = 20 free spins
6 bonus symbols = 25 free spins

What Is the Safety Level?

Starting from 4 rows and 4,096 ways to win, every win adds another row and more ways to win, up to 8 rows and 262,144 ways of potential win. Unlike the base game, the number of rows and ways to win can only increase. This feature is known as the safety level.

Main Symbols of Black River Gold

With rocky mountains in the background, the reels are set in a metal structure. There's a classic western soundtrack while you spin the reels. The symbols include:

The A, K, Q, and J playing cards
There are also sheriff badges, whiskey glasses, and revolvers
You'll also encounter precious stones, gold nuggets, and diamonds.
Kane, the main character, is the highest-paying symbol that returns 1.8, 2, 2.5, or 3 times the bet for 3, 4, 5, or 6 in combination
The red rose is the wild symbol and substitutes for all symbols except the scatter and Wild Compass symbols.

All symbols can appear as MAXI symbols, which means that you can see Super, Mega, and Epic symbols respectively sized 2x2, 3x3, and 4x4 on the screen.

Final Thoughts on Black River Gold Mobile Slot

As you can see, there's both a desktop and tablet version available. This is because ELK Studios produces all its games with HTML5 technology, primarily focusing on mobile gameplay. In terms of gameplay, I found it similar to other series in the Gold series, but with extras added to the Revolver feature, the Wild Compass feature, and the characteristic sticky wilds that make Black River Gold a unique game. It's another great product from ELK Studios, although titles like NetEnt's Dead or Alive II and Nolimit City's Deadwood provide greater opportunities in terms of gameplay and maximum win potential!
